description: ARCADE is an ARCADE game in which you shoot 'n' dodge. Are you dead? Press START button and shoot 'n' dodge again! Sounds easy, doesn't it? I would argue with you!

name: Dr4x
description: A fast paced dark fantasy turn based strategy game with horror elements In a world with many secrets to uncover... The game has simple, fun, fast paced gameplay full of tough choices where each of the many factions plays wildly differently and the world evolves and changes as you play.

name: ToBas Zombies
description: Willkommen in ToBas Zombies! Euch erwartet unter anderem: verschiedene NPCs, verschiedene Zombies, völlig zufällig generierte Spielwelten, Dauerhaft Spawnede Zombies, 34 verschiedene Schuss Waffen und vieles mehr!

name: Run Run Run
description: In Run Run Run the players compete against each other or during battles in exchange for points that can be converted into coins used to customize your character.

name: Astonishing Baseball Manager 21
description: Build your dream lineup, manage a baseball team, sign contracts and live the exciting life of a baseball manager!

name: GALSAD: Galactic Salvage and Disposal
description: Space-based 3D flight arcade game. Blast planetary debris and mine asteroids on your way to high mission scores. Climb the leaderboard. Solo developed indie game.

name: FiberTales: DummyKart
description: An action Kart Racing game in which you control one of the dummies, and use its abilities and weapons to go through a series of chaotic challenges to get to the first place.

name: Match on the Nile
description: Match On The Nile is a midcore Match 3 RPG roguelike set in Ancient Egypt. You play Neith, who will fight the Gods to protect her country.

name: Gewevo: Interstellar
description: Gewevo : Interstallar is a space strategy game derived from the tabletop RPG universe Gewevo. It offers an approach a little closer to a wargame with regard to the empire management aspect. Made with passion by a one-man team;)

name: Asteroids 44
description: Remake of one of the oldest arcade classics. Challenge yourself and advance through the levels filled with asteroids, power-ups and virtual bitcoins, that you can spend in the shop to get ready for what's coming. Get your friends and share the adventure together in co-op mode!

name: Domino Effect: Build and Topple
description: Domino Effect is a sandbox simulation for domino toppling. You have infinite dominoes in your hand to build whatever you want.

name: Fight.exe
description: Fight.EXE is a traditional fighting game that has something for new and veteran players. Special moves are performed by 1 button but can be enhanced with motion inputs.

name: Awaking Godsoul
description: "GODSOUL" is a light cyberpunk + mythical beast girl card battle + character development RPG game. The "rebel" girls who resonate with your soul and possess the power of "God Soul" can travel through the different space of the soul.

name: Gazzlers
description: Gazzlers is an insane VR shooter full of diesel-fueled chaos! Embark on an epic train ride across the lands of Ginkgo. Build your ultimate weapon and shoot, block, and dodge your way through hordes of crazy enemies to reach the Temple of the Machine God.

name: Momo.exe VR
description: Horror VR game where you need to do different tasks from horror creature received by your phone. And remember: Don't chat with MOMO!

name: Deep Space Salvage Crew VR
description: A first-person procedural VR roguelike shooter, set in deep space. Find old wrecks adrift in space, board them and fight your way to the bridge to claim the salvage rights.

name: Lone Wolf
description: A third-person exploration game placed inside of an eye-catching stylized forest. Players control a stunning wolf who was born without a pack and is trying to find a place where he fits in. Along the way, players encounter other animals and secrets which will lead you to uncover your true self.

name: Polus.gg
description: A free mod for Among Us, with new gamemodes, a new account system, and more!

name: Would You Like to Run an Idol Café? 2
description: Hoping to save the café he works at from being closed, Naoya enlists the help of his cute maid co-workers, Ichigo, Kuu, Mayuki. The three girls form an idol unit, Sweet Shoreline, to popularize The Seaside Café - but becoming an idol isn't that easy!

name: Wicked Aeons
description: WICKED AEONS is an innovative game combining the tactical real-time RPG and rogue-like genres. Control teams of heroes to roam the ruthless city of Abjectalia.A rogue-lite game in dungeon crawler mode

name: Mr.DomusMundi
description: Prince Mundi solves only global issues on the scale of the kingdom.

name: Grim Tales: Crimson Hollow - Collector's Edition
description: What's waiting at Crimson Hollow?

name: Oasis the Great
description: Oasis the Great is an online multi-player physics based sandbox game that have infinite possibilities.

name: Slenderman: Unbecoming
description: Slenderman: Unbecoming is a new adaptation on the supernatural entity Slenderman. The game describes the events of a park ranger haunted by Slenderman. with an addition of in-game choices, you narrative is up to you: make the right choices and you just may save yourself from the Slenderman.

name: Cyberdad
description: Set in the year 2078, CYBERDAD is a 2D cyberpunk gunfight dungeon crawler following a disgruntled father seeking to rescue his daughter, and exact his revenge.

name: Tatakae! Harmonia Ongaku-tai
description: Tatakae! Harmonia Ongaku-tai is a RPG in which you fight battles with the instruments belonging to famous classical composers. With calming classic music as running as bgm, you will find hints and events referring to classical music all over in the game. Aim to take your country back from the evil queen with the power of classical music!

name: Hi Poker 3D: Texas Holdem
description: The first real 3D high-quality Texas Hold 'em game!

name: Hexad
description: Hexad is a single and multiplayer competitive turn-based tactical RPG with ARPG-like itemization and crafting and a MOBA-like lobby. Character customization options let you create your own unique style. Solo and PvP competitive game modes. Make your way to the top of the leaderboards!

name: Playbook
description: PLAYBOOK is the playable music video network for Rock, Metal and Punk fans.

name: Fear in the Modern House: Ch.3
description: Face the challenges behind this supposedly cursed residence, solve puzzles, find hidden objects, and find a way to escape this place without getting caught.

name: Beyond the Edge of Owlsgard
description: Save a peaceful world from being annihilated by machines in this oldschool point&click tale, inspired by classic animated movies and adventure games of the 90s.

name: Souwan no Soldat: The Soldat with Twin Arms
description: The Soldat with Twin Arms is 2.5D side-scrolling action game with focus on a exhilarating and comfortable battle. Let's clear the stages by using various skills such as wire action using two extended arms! Crush problems by going back and forth between the cyberpunk world and virtual spaces!

name: Grammarian Ltd
description: Play a simulation game while learning grammar!

name: Theiaology
description: An Atomic Game-Engine that weaves FATE. Generative Voxel Realms Await.

name: VR Wonderland 2: Adventures in a Fruit Boat
description: In the game you will become a villain smaller than an orange, and then row a boat made of oranges, sailing on the sea.

name: Casual Challenge Players' Club
description: If you like anime and pool, then this game is for you. Play the story mode or have fun playing with your friends and family.

name: The Sol Device 2
description: After escaping the research ship, Samuel finds himself crash landed on a foreign planet overrun by a hostile organization. Now it's up to Samuel and his trusty SOL equipment to rescue the scientists who also escaped the ship, and find a way off of the planet.

name: Run!!!
description: Let's run happily~

name: Ele Rampage
description: Crush cars and send humans flying by ramming into them as a big angry elephant and cause as much chaos as possible. The objective is simple but it won't be easy, the clock is running out and there are enemies waiting to stop you from achieving your goal.

name: Slime Kingdom: An Unlikely Adventure!
description: An adventure with the most unlikeliest of heroes. Gather support from unexpected places as you journey through an expansive, episodic story, full of cheesy humor, quirky characters, monologuing villains and TROPES. Many, many tropes!

name: Arch Stone vs. The Zombie Specters
description: Arch Stone vs The Zombie Specters - Bad Dudes have unleashed Zombie Specters on the City. The DoD sends in Special Agent Arch Stone to stop them. Clear the Bad Dudes and Zombie Specters from several progressively challenging levels.

name: Quickdraw
description: QUICKDRAW is a simple western-shootout-inspired fighting game that anyone can pick up and enjoy!

name: AI Arcade
description: Build your own robot AI and stress test its abilities in a Battle Royale. Along the way learn concepts such as Utility AI, Monte Carlo Tree Search, Neural Networks and Machine Learning.

name: Aery: Little Bird Adventure
description: Aery is a peaceful exploration game from the perspective of a little bird who decided to discover the world. Calm down from the hassle of your daily life, experience the feeling of flying, and immerse yourself into beautiful and atmospheric landscapes.

name: Open Mod
description: A free-to-play, tactical, community-driven first person shooter that aims to expand slowly and steadily. We focused our attention on game mechanics and customizability, providing our players the opportunity to personalize their experience on as many levels as possible.

name: Essex: The Whale Hunter
description: Experience a great seas adventure inspired by the famous Moby Dick. Grab a harpoon and take on the largest animals on Earth – the whales. Hunt, harvest resources, gain fame and amass a fortune!

name: Find All 2: Middle Ages
description: This is a sequel to the FIND ALL game. This time you will be looking for items in the Middle Ages. Search for over 350 hidden objects. A game for all ages.

name: Killer
description: KILLER: The game is a linear classic action TPS game and you need to find what will you do to finish the game. Sometimes it can be tough.

name: Senpa.io
description: It takes about 5 minutes to figure out the mechanics. Really relaxing, but dynamic gameplay awaits everyone from the first moments of the game. Control cell and eat the food. Become bigger and stronger. Get to fight other players, talk in chat, make friends and enemies.

name: Rog Citadel XV
description: Explore a rebel armory filled with the latest ROG gear, uncover secret surprises, and put your skills to the test in a unique virtual experience.

name: Spacecraft speed
description: Spacecraft speed is a casual racing game. The speed increases every 100 meters. You control a shuttle in a huge abandoned spaceship. Challenge yourself in a new personal record time with precise turns and obstacle avoidance.

name: Gobby McGobblenutz Presents: The Questionably Quirky Quiz Show
description: Are you Quirky enough to win The Questionably Quirky Quiz Show with Gobby McGobblenutz, and permanently enter your name into the Hall of Legends for other players around the world to see how incredibly awesome you are?! Well then... What are you waiting for?!

name: Legendary Mahjong 2
description: Restore the temples and return the beloved in this mahjong advanture! Test your skills in 7 unique game modes.

name: Itrp: Gas Prison
description: 10 minutes and you are free. Only 10 minutes and you will not be asked for anything else. Stay in these cells for 10 minutes, and you may not come back here again. But at the same time, only one condition is required of you..... Be attentive.

name: The Death
description: The Death (Thần Trùng) is a Vietnamese psychological horror adventure game.

name: NationWar: Annals
description: This is a grand strategy + real-time battle sandbox game with the theme of Spring and Autumn and Warring States. The game starts on the land of China in the eighth century BC. Players will act as one of the countries and start a long battle for hegemony with other countries.

name: Enemies
description: Venturing into the exciting work of Lollygag Labs, a game developing corporation looking to breach the barriers of what can be achieved with gaming, then things take a dark turn...get ready to jump into the crazy world of ENEMIES!

name: CuberPunk 2090
description: CuberPunk 2090 is an adventure game set in the village of Cuberovka. You play as Vova, a gamer and former president of Cube-States.

name: Fun Platformer
description: fun Platformer you have to survive bees and rock enemies and slime enemies you have to make it to the trophy without dying.

name: Hellmall
description: A slot machine, deck-builder roguelike. In the 1990s PleromOS created Cloud9, a digital afterlife where the wealthy could upload their consciousnesses. Now, decades later, all things tend toward the mean, and Cloud9 is an endless, inescapable HELLMALL.

name: MultiDimensional 4-in-a-row
description: Whether you just want to play a classic game with friends, or want to crank it up a few notches to play in higher dimensions, this game will let you play local Vs or online against friends or strangers.

name: Tanxy
description: tanxy is a game where you can program. In tanxy you can write a JavaScript program to control any Unit on your behalf. Manual control is also possible. Your goal is to destroy all enemy Units and to keep yours.

name: Finding Lulu: Global Challenge One
description: Help Amy find her best friend Lulu, and retrieve the Victory Code.

name: The Informant Chronicles: Chronicle 1 - Riverside Danger Part 1
description: Informant Red is assigned to a ten year old settlement on a river that is fearful in light of a massacre that left over half the village dead on a forest expedition. As she spends more time getting to know the locals, she discovers clues that suggest this incident was no accident.

name: Festivals: Headliners
description: Design your Event Sites, Book Artists, Build your Career as a Promotor and Produce your own Festivals!

name: Neurophobia
description: Neurophobia is a personal first-person decryption exploration. In order to get rid of neurological symptoms, the protagonist woke up from a coma for unknown reasons and has come to the research institute. As one of the former researchers, he came to explore the true face of it.

name: Into the Dangerous World I Leapt
description: Follow Idony on a journey to find her brother Edus in a strange factory where the walls between dimensions are thin.

name: Eos 27
description: Eos 27 is a 2D, strategic action-platformer in which you overtake your enemies through both careful planning and tight fighting. Carefully design an arena tailored to your enemy, then put it to the test in an epic, fast-paced fight for the sake of humankind.

name: Crewin: The Wrath Of Athys
description: Delve into an Open World RPG game and save the world. Use variations of close and ranged combat with special attacks, sneaking, and dodges to defeat your opponents during your quest.

name: Space Voyage: Episode 1 - A Big Soviet Adventure
description: Retro-style adventure that tells the story of a simple Soviet cosmonaut.

name: SCP-970: The Recursive Room
description: SCP-970 is a spatial phenomenon wherein a collection of rooms are looped on themselves. In all cases found, this is by means of a series of doors appearing in the walls, all in a straight line, such that it is possible to walk forwards and end up at the starting position.

name: Provenance: Room 226
description: Provenance: Room 226 is a first person adventure puzzle game. It tells the story of Vincent Spade, a young scientist working for the Stadler Corporation, who uncovers a dark secret that takes him to a strange new world.

name: Idolyaki: From Delinquents to Pop Stars
description: Become friends or foes with the three most notorious criminals at your school as you help them transform into pop idols and compete in a nearby contest! A short, quick game with six possible endings!

name: Cargo: TD on Rails
description: Arm and defend your train in this real-time strategy tower defense game. After you make a fast delivery upgrade your weapons and do more dangerous missions.

name: Super Toy Cars Offroad
description: Super Toy Cars Offroad brings the series off the beaten track and into the mud, sand, snow, and more! Find your own way in this fast-paced arcade racing game where you control miniature offroad cars that speed through amazing tracks populated with supersized everyday objects.

name: Winter Warfare: Survival
description: A recon mission goes bad, and you are the only one who survive an enemy attack, you are left alone to survive in a harsh ambient.

name: 3D Double Dealing Character
description: 3DHzc is a free view shooting game, you will play Hakurei ReiMu,Kirisame Marisa,Izayoi Sakuya to defeat the boss

name: 109 Remastered
description: In 109 Remastered players will pilot a scout ship that has befallen an unfortunate fate while out on routine patrols. In the midst of the celestial ruins they must search in a bid for survival, they will find something disturbing.

name: M.I.S.V VR
description: M.I.S.V is a SCP INSPIRED Organisation that works under the Radar as a Cleaner and Capture Unit for Anamolic Creatures. Play alone or with 3 Friends against terrifying Creatures controlled by a Player or AI, or fight against other players in a competitive 5vs5 Match in different Modes.

name: Wordding
description: Fill in the blanks in this quick based trivia game!

name: Last Judgment: VR
description: Play as a talented astronauts and save the earth in an awesome Virtual reality game.

name: Geometric Sniper: Card Game
description: Have you ever seen a roguelike sniper card game? Not! We didn't know any of them either, so we turned our favorite sniper game into one! Get ready to find cards and hunt your targets armed with the deck you've built! Overcome the challenges and make the right choices to save the day!

name: Forgotten: The Game
description: Experience all the stages of dementia in this mood-swinging psychological horror game that we call FORGOTTEN. Travel as a fox through progressively disturbing stages searching for memories explaining the protagonist's life. Pay close attention to what the fox is trying to offer before it's too late

name: Mental Hospital: Child of Evil
description: Mental Hospital is a truly scary first-person stealth horror game. Discover heart-thumping terror, chase and scary creatures in this atmospheric horror game.

name: Karman line: the edge of war
description: Explore the innovative future air combat PvP game. Select your fighter jet and enjoy every unique battle under the Kármán line.

name: Balls Mania!
description: How well can you control your balls when they are completely unrestrained and free as the wind? Scoring points by capturing your blue balls has never been more fun! Use your quick reflexes, ball goop, swords and more to claim your fame in this relentless action game!

name: P.U.R.G.A.T.O.R.Y
description: Welcome to P.U.R.G.A.T.O.R.Y! Experimental dark comedy sandbox time killer. Judge souls upon their arrival in death, do they deserve heaven, hell or the grinder, that is entirely up to you.

name: Gravity Runner
description: Gravity Runner is a physics based 3D Platformer/Runner with a killer synthwave soundtrack. Make your way through retro synthwave worlds, filled with challenging gravity anomalies to escape an ever growing black hole.

name: MesetaMiner: CodeName
description: What's better than being a millionaire, a billionaire? That boring grind is played out, your goal in this game will not only be to make lots of money, but to create currency and become a Federal reserve system.

name: Inventory Manager
description: Everyone's favorite part of any video game is managing their inventory, so why aren't there tons of games available where this is the main feature? To fill the void this game focuses on the most fun aspect of any game Inventory Management!

name: Anime Tetris
description: The legendary game "Tetris" in a unique performance and atmosphere

name: Maze Mania: The Ultimate 3D Maze Game
description: In the world of Maze Mania, no maze is too difficult. Push your skills to the limit as you navigate around almost impossible mazes.

name: Mission 1985
description: This game is a tribute to the Run "N Gun games (Commando, Ikari Warrior, Heavy Barrel, Guerilla Wars, Mercs...) from the mid 1980's that you could find in arcades or on 16 bit consoles.

name: Time Trap 2: Search and Find Objects Game - Hidden Pictures
description: Explore this post-apocalypse world in all-around locations! Immerse yourself into an unusual adventure, full of intrigue, fantastic creatures and mysterious temporal anomalies! The newest hidden object game.

name: Cursed Treasure 2: Ultimate Edition - Tower Defense
description: Why be good when you can be... bad? Cursed Treasure 2 is a classic tower-defense game, remastered and carefully re-balanced. Build towers of powerful orcs, demons, and undead, and master powerful spells, to protect your precious hoard from all manner of no-good do-gooders.

name: Space Mercenary Shooter: Episode 2
description: Space Mercenary Shooter is an episodic FPS inspired by early shooter games, featuring handcrafted levels and a fully voice-acted cast of characters.

name: Minesweeper X
description: Minesweeper X is a new redefined experience based on the classic video game Minesweeper. A thrilling game where you are always at the edge of your seat.

name: A.V.A
description: A.V.A is a classic FPS shooter game featuring various types of PVP/PVE game Modes. Depending on the battlefield, you can choose Pointman, Rifleman, and Sniper and enjoy strategic team play.

name: Velocity Legends: Action Racing Game
description: Immerse yourself in one of the arcade action racing games, stunning visual and particle effects and epic action that turn every race into a real blockbuster race movie.

name: Krim: The War in the Crimea 1941-42
description: KRIM: The War in the Crimea 1941-42 is an operational/strategic simulation of the German 11th Army’s operations in the Crimean Peninsula from late October 1941 through 4 July 1942.

name: Tap Tap Beer: Tavern Edition
description: Serve beer to thirsty Elves, Orcs, Wizards and all sorts of mighty heroes (and the occasional evil lords). Keep the beer flowing and the gold pouring at magical speeds unlocking new and fantastic lands to expand your beer empire!

name: Iron World
description: Iron World is a brutal action in a post-apocalyptic world with a taste of Mad Max.

name: Touhou Money Stocks Shops
description: What's come to Fantasyland is an unprecedented backgammon boom! The girls raid the money game by buying shops, buying stocks, using bills, etc.! Multiplayer support!

name: Reiterland: Meine Rennpferde
description: Reiterland: Meine Rennpferde is a horse racing game. Select your horse and equipment for the race and beat the time or complete missions. Control the horse with the keyboard in three difficulty levels. Compete against up to 7 other players via the internet on different tracks in all four seasons.

name: Spiral: Episode 1
description: Spiral is a third-person narratively driven exploration game sharing a poetic vision of cognitive degeneration seen from the inside. It tells the story of Bernard, a man who wishes goodbye one last time to the memories that built him from his early childhood to who he is today.

name: Spectre
description: Employ stealth tactics as the Spectres, or defend your objectives as the heavily armed Reapers in this thrilling teamwork-driven multiplayer action experience!

name: The Thought Police Hotline: Episode 1
description: Do you like comedy and sci-fi and want to try something new? This visual novel is the first episode and it's John's first day at the Thought Police Hotline. You can click to move the dialogue forward. Estimated 1h to 1h 45m reading time depending on reading speed.

name: H-Sniper: World War II
description: H-Sniper: World War II is a dynamic shooting game based on a sniper mechanics and inspired by World War II theme. You are playing as one of a few soldiers left, shooting the enemies from a hidden spot on the battleground.

name: PetrifactionUnderRuin
description: The biggest feature is that it produces state changes such as petrification in real time until it becomes incapacitated. Multiple types of materials can be selected for petrification. The content of the game is an avoidant STG where the ending branches depending on the action in the boss battle.

name: Cat Interstellar: Episode II
description: A short story inspired by Robert Heinlein's: Starship Trooper

name: Snake: Reloaded
description: Immerse yourself in the exciting world of snake warfare, use special abilities, and follow an epic story!

name: Secret of The Lost Keys: Episode I - The Attack on Disred
description: A classic style 2D platfomer game where you take the role of Captain Keysis, hero of the Land of Eralia. Find your way across the levels searching the magical lost keys, collecting items, avoiding traps, and fighting powerful enemies to obtain new power ups!

name: PoupeIIe of ChimneyTown VR: Into the World
description: It is VR Anime of the big hit picture book "PoupeIIe Of ChimneyTown". You must try this at least once.

name: The Kotonoha Sisters and the Legend of Lysant Island
description: This game is a turn-based action RPG that moves around in a 3D space where you can enjoy various scenery with cute 2D characters. Operate the Kotonoha sisters and explore a fun and mysterious island!

name: Push Blox
description: Block-pushing puzzle game with challenging high quality levels.

name: Stealth Fighter Dec
description: Inspired by flight sims of the '90s, you will be piloting a selection of fictional stealth fighter bombers over varied terrain completing procedurally generated missions such as precision bombing, clandestine intelligence gathering, close air support and many others.

name: Red Hands: 2-Player Game
description: Red Hands – 2-Player Game is based on a cool two player game known as "hot hands", "slaps", "tap hands", "dual hands" or "slap jack". It's a fun game for people of all ages who like to play competitive games.

name: Premier Manager 08
description: Premier Manager 08 is the definitive pick up and play football management experience. Whether you want to start at the top with one of the big boys and go for instant glory, or whether you want to guide a minnow to the top flight, Premier Manager will put you in the management hotseat.

name: Japanese Drag Racing
description: What are you waiting for? Enter now in the craziest Japanese Drag Racing game on the market and be the KING OF THE ROADS!

name: Offroad Truck Racing
description: Offroad Truck Racing - innovation rally simulator about truck racing in different places. There you can buy your first truck and tuning it. After you can participate in international racing festivals in snow mountains, deserts, meadows and jungles.

name: Rest In Peace
description: A third-person action adventure game in a kingdom overrun with corrupted spirits. You play as Wren, a caretaker for the Autumn Court tasked with cleansing the corruption and returning the recently risen Autumn King back to his tomb.

name: The Undisputables: Online Multiplayer
description: The Undisputables : Online Multiplayer is a PvP online multiplayer TPS shooter game with fantastic comic cartoon 3D graphics and captivating gameplay.

name: Stowaway
description: An 10 player online social deduction game inspired by games like Among Us & Town of Salem, where the stowaway is tasked with killing the crew before they reach land!

name: Epidemic
description: Experience a day as a Physician during the world's biggest epidemic of the century. Use medical equipment to diagnose and treat patients, make critical decision under pressure. Save as many as you can. You will be monitored on performance.

name: Fractured
description: Fractured is a side scroll action game focused on boss battles. As the hero, you take on different boss fights from underground monsters to fighting dragons. Learn from each fight to gain to skill necessary to take down epic monsters.

name: Pago Forest: Dragon's Revenge
description: The first of its kind, "Pago's Forest" is an educational game: you improve your grammar through the discovery of a heroic fantasy tale.

name: The Impossible
description: The Impossible is a minimal perspective illusion puzzle game. You control a small square in the Impossible world and remember: nothing is Impossible

name: Plastic Blue: lofi beats to study and sleep to
description: Listen to lofi beats while you do cool and important things. Build your own toy collection on the breaks.

name: Tap Football Star! 20-21
description: Become a football player and lead a legendary career. Evolve in 250 teams spread across twenty different championships !

name: Cracks
description: Cracks is a single player side-scrolling platformer following the couple Liam and Lana, as they navigate the highs, lows and struggles of their relationship. Their relationship is part of the game, where their level of cooperation depends on how connected they are.

name: Maestro VR
description: Maestro VR is a rhythmic music video game where you become an orchestra conductor in Virtual Reality. Feel the unique experience of conducting a symphony orchestra.

name: L.S.D.: Lasting Spiritual Derangement
description: L.S.D. is a first person shooter set during a hallucinogen trip.In this dream-like, surreal experience, you will explore large, mysterious open worlds, find weapons and fight against dangerous enemies.Will you be able to break the loop and get back to reality?

name: Magic Time
description: Magic Time is an adventure in the arcade genre with a magical setting.

name: Slide: Animal Race
description: Play up to 8 friends (or enemies) together in this couch multiplayer racing game with cute sliding animals. Dive and jump to avoid obstacles, use bonuses and master the sliding mechanics on the crazy tracks to outrun the horde!

name: Death off the Cuff: Remastered
description: No criminal has ever been a match for you, and everybody is looking forward to a description of your brilliant deductions. There is just one small problem. One tiny detail that makes it different this time. A mere trifle, really. This time you have no idea who did it.

name: Don't Crash: The Zombie Game
description: WARNING THIS GAME CRASHES WHEN YOU DIE! IT'S THE POINT OF THE GAME! Game features "endless" Zombie and Soldier combat, several levels As well as a shotgun, pistols, assault rifles, RPG Launcher and a knife. This is a work in progress game.

name: Purrfection! The Cat Tossing Game!!
description: PURRfection, the cat tossing game! is a room-scale mini-game VR-only experience where players take on the role of a reckless cat factory worker tasked with sorting the cats into their correct bins before your 75 second shift ends.

name: Encore Classic Casino Games
description: You've hit the jackpot with the most comprehensive collection of casino games available for your PC! Encore Classic Casino Games is jam-packed with more than 600 variations on authentic casino games that will make you feel the rush and excitement of the casino floor.

name: Counter-Terrorism Ops
description: Check if you can free all hostages without incurring losses among the members of the anti-terrorist group. Choose the right equipment for a given action, make tactical decisions for the entire group, and shoot from the perspective of one of them!

name: GamerZ CastlE Rush!
description: Simple Tower Defense game in pixel graphics

name: Criminal Russia
description: Criminal Russia is an adrenaline-fueled thriller full of primal brutality, dangerous shootouts and a complex high-quality storyline! The scene of action is a prototype of modern Russia in an alternative reality.

name: Check, please!: Restaurant Simulator
description: Check, please! is a restaurant tycoon/simulator game. It puts you in charge of making your restaurant the best dining destination in town. Build and decorate, manage staff, keep your facilities clean, serve delicious food, and more.

name: Sex Robot Road Trip: Highway to Harrisburg
description: A comedy visual novel about a sex robot, a stolen car, and the highways of Pennsylvania.

name: Fortress Defender
description: This game, "Fortress Defender", is a side-scrolling power-up shooting game with an 80's flavor. Defeat the enemies that appear one after another, dodge their attacks, and aim for the boss that lurks in the depths of the stage. There are a total of eight stages with various tricks and bosses.

name: Battlecruiser Generations
description: In celebration of the 25 yr anniversary of the first release, this compendium contains all 4 games in the Battlecruiser 3000AD series which was first released in 1996.

name: Ball Ranger
description: In this world, people who adventure are called rangers. And you are the rangers who are constantly challenging and looking for adventures.

name: El Pescador
description: Funny, short and chep. What are you waiting for?

name: SIK Space Invader Kreature

name: Your Adventure

name: Wonhon: The Beginning
description: A paranormal stealth-action and tactics game about a young Korean girl who was killed in a military conflict and returned from the dead with the ability to turn into a ghost and possess living creatures to exact her revenge.

name: Depthqvr Aqua

description: Try to Catch Up - is a fun 2D platformer game created on the Contruct 2 game engine. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible without getting caught by your evil clone. Clones will multiply with each step you take. Beware, there may be many!

name: Mystery Box: Hidden Secrets

name: Early Quest 2
description: Join Weiry, one of the protagonists of Early Quest, on her new adventure in a magical world ...

name: Dungeon Danger Traps
description: Do you want to know if you are a good tomb raider? Dungeon Danger Traps will help you find out! And it will also allow you to prove everyone that you are also a first-class runner! But be careful, who knows where the road will lead if you choose the wrong path.

name: Find Match Icons
description: Find the icon among hundreds of others.

name: AstroBike

Collect every emerald - or the one challenging diamond - in each track and then head for the black hole. Discover the fastest route through 70 epic tracks. AstroBike is the ultimate trial of skill + strategy + speed.

name: Imoto
description: Forge your own path throw the BLACK SWAN corporation branches to destroy their monstrous monsters creations and revenging your clan also your innocent little sister

name: Kingslayers
description: Kingslayers is a free-to-play tactical strategy game. Choose from various units and skills to build your ideal team formation then outsmart your opponent to slay their King before they slay yours.

name: Time of the Clones
description: Thanks to an unsuccessful experiment, the scientific complex found itself in a time loop. Any ideas how to fix this?!

name: Don't Hate Me

But Demons will be there to get you lost in the dungeon, in order to find the door to paradise you will have to find the clues and expose the demons hidden in your team.

name: VR Summer Sports
description: Casual VR sports game. Try to beat the competition in 10 unique disciplines and progress your way to the top in one or all of them!

name: Higher

name: SGS Afrika Korps: Tunisia
description: SGS Afrika Korps: Tunisia is a complete standalone game that covers the famous Tunisian campaign of November 1942 to June 1943. Hold Tunisia as the Axis, or expel your enemy from Africa and set the stage for the Allies invasion of Sicily.

name: Space Yandere
description: Space Yandere is a cute, dramatic story experience. Play as a robot, made by the love-crazy Luna, en route to a paradise planet. The game features beautiful art, loveable characters, and compelling music. Elements of horror, but cute at it's core. A single playthrough may take around 45 minutes.

name: Raygun Chess
description: ​A VR-first, real-time, chess-family strategy board game for 2 to 4 players. With very simple and elegant rules, move your pieces, shoot enemies, and the last Leader standing wins.

description: Rodina.doc tells the history of modern Russia in catastrophes, protests, and criminal cases. The gameplay is inspired by classic adventure games. It shows everyday life and tells the stories of ordinary people against a backdrop of historical catastrophes. Many artifacts from the epoch, research texts, and historical eyewitness accounts can be discovered over the course of the game. The documentary is combined with elements of fantastical realism, quotes with fantasy, adventure with classic arcades.

name: Hundreds of Mysteries: Season1
description: Every case has a story behind it! You need to find and collect clues in the scene and reason at every level to find the truth. The clues can be associated or cross-layered.

name: Word Game: Episode 0
description: Word game is literally a game of words. Player controls "I" to find clues between lines, delete words to change the meaning of sentences, or shift words to rewrite facts. “I” must be wise and brave enough complete the mission of words. May the best "I” win!

name: Zombies Everywhere 2
description: Sin descripción

description: Deemed a Master of the Chinese Bird and Flower Painting Style, Ohara Koson produced hundreds of prints during his life. Discover 7 majestic pieces made by one of Japan's most celebrated artists in this traditional Jigsaw Puzzle Game.

description: A simple one-of-a-kind tower defense game where you need to wash cars before they reach the end of the road. Create mazes. Upgrade your towers. Wash all sorts of cars, trucks, boats, and planes.

name: The Dream of Shadowlands: Episode 2
description: Explore a long-forgotten temple crawling with freakish monsters in the second episode of this action-horror RPG, uncovering an ancient history and meeting loveable characters through hand-drawn visuals inspired by 90s anime.

name: Renai Karichaimashita: Koikari - Love For Hire
description: Due to family circumstances, Yuki has only one belief: money will make his little sister happy. And thus, he works part-time jobs late into the night. His plan is to start working full-time after graduation, but his little sister tells him that if he won't go to university, then she won't either.

name: Ancient Warriors Casino Jackpot
description: Ancient Warriors Casino Jackpot - Try your luck, play the BEST Casino game. Experience a luxury classic Ancient Warriors themed casino slots game right now!

name: Super Dungeon Maker: Fink's Awakening
description: Design & Discover trap-ridden dungeons in this free prologue to Super Dungeon Maker - the zelda-inspired dungeon maker where you create & play the dungeons of your dreams and share them with the world.

Type through five brutal chapters of gameplay to learn the fate of humanity through the eyes of its would-be savior. Need to kill that zombie? Use your words!

In this irreverent story, you follow a crew of Space Truckers as they try to survive in a world of aliens, zombies, robots, androids, the Space Cartels, and terrible secrets, in and out of a virtual Internet that holds its own mysteries.

name: Megajump
description: Only some will reach the top. Will you be one of them? in this precision 3D platformer where every jump is a risk and easy to learn-hard to master controls you will certainly feel rewarded once you start climbing from the Pit of Despair. Just don't fall.

name: Box box
description: The box follows after the box after the box after the box after the box after the box after the box after the box after the box after the box after the box after the box after the box after the box after the box.

name: Angry Brides
description: Angry Brides is an online flash-based browser game on Facebook. It was launched by the matchmaking site Shaadi.com to help raise awareness of dowry harassment in India.

name: Electioneering
description: You are at the nexus of the events of 2020; you will hire agents, run political ads, research topics, use hacking, and more in this turn-based political strategy game. In Electioneering, your goal is to ensure your candidate becomes the next President of the United States.

name: Conundrum
description: Conundrum is a first-person puzzle-game that takes you on a journey through a complex where every room is a puzzle, and the whole complex is a mystery.

name: Space Defender
description: Space Defender is a top-down 2D arcade space shooter with some RPG elements.

name: CTcity
description: Reality ruins, tiles of CT city block his heart. Imagination flies, plants in the mind become his star. Boy wonders, the road is nowhere to go. Journey begins, the key is just himself. Welcome to CT city!

name: Uncle Office: Uncle Dating Simulator

Players choose one of seven (+1?) characters, each with different unique abilities, and use their shots, special Shikigami attack, and bombs to destroy the enemy. The unique backgrounds of each character are intricately intertwined, creating an interesting storyline for the shooter.

description: This basic-level course is designed to enhance laboratory scientists' ability to identify how personal protective equipment (PPE) can help reduce the risk of exposure to hazardous materials, prevent transmission of infectious agents, and demonstrate how to don and doff PPE in the correct order.

name: Momentum
description: Fast-paced racing game in a retro 80's neon style.

name: An Un-epic story: The adventure of Enki and Tiny Freddie
description: Enki and Freddie's contract was simple: defeat a nearby river monster. They knew tentacles would be an issue, but there are other complications too… For example, who left the strange marks on their hands? How do they get rid of them? Find the answers to these mysteries by reading "An Un-epic Story"

name: A Trail of Ooze: Chapter 1
description: A Trail of Ooze is an udderly amoosing point-and-click adventure set on a small Swedish farm. Play as Majros - a sarcastic cow on a mission to save her human and unravel an ooze conspiracy.

name: Not My President: Level 1

description: Texas Hold'em is a very popular board game and we offer a wide range of poker games for you to choose from. You can challenge yourself against players from all over the world! This addictive game is sure to bring you more fun!

name: Plague Doctor: Contagion - 430 BCE-2020 AD
description: Put yourself in the place of four people in the midst of four devastating historical disease outbreaks. Explore the choices that saved or cost the lives of countless people and the common thread that runs though them all - human nature and greed.

description: Beached is a completely free to play experience, where your only goal is to SURVIVE. You must take on these challenges on by defending your base, scavenging various POI's (point of interests) around the map. Fight off animals, other players... and a strange force that lays in the sea...

description: DREAMWORLD is a puzzle platform game. The player must overcome obstacles to advance and reach his goal: the heart of the tornado. In the levels of the wanderers, it will be necessary to solve puzzles by assembling items and placing them in the right place.

description: Sin descripción

The game tells the story of an ordinary young man who pursues love, grows up in the process of hard work, and finally reaps friendship and love.

description: Step into a large and magical world where you rule not one but two universes. Fight evil, save evil or be evil. What you choose to do defines your character in this text based RPG.

name: Heresy Simulator
description: An adult (NSFW), open-world tactical RPG

name: Cadavers for Dinner
description:
Boukenmeshi features character designs from Takehito Harada. Harada is character designer for the Disgaea franchise, as well as Labyrinth of Refrain and The Witch and the Hundred Knights. Players will gather food and materials from the dungeon as they go, cooking new, weird, and delicious dishes to improve their stats and grow stronger.

The game will incorporate a character generation feature, and involve a party of four characters. Various jobs are available to the party. These include Swordsman, Cook (who can improve the quality and diversity of rations), and even the “Unemployed” Job, which sounds like a Dark Souls-style Deprived character.

Boukenmeshi will also involve survival-game mechanics. This will involve managing the party’s calorie and water intake. Players can cook food while in camp, but also eat ingredients while fighting in strategic battles. These confer status effects and benefits from the consumption.

name: Dragon Quest X Offline: Deluxe Edition
description:
Dragon Quest X Offline is a stand-alone single-player remake of the 2012 MMORPG title Dragon Quest X Online.

Dragon Quest X Offline: Deluxe Edition includes:
- Dragon Quest X: Rise of the Five Tribes Offline game
- Dragon Quest X: The Sleeping Hero and the Guiding Ally Offline DLC
- Dragon Quest X Offline in-game items

After completing the story of both the main game and the DLC, players can carry their progress to the Online version in order to continue their adventure in the world of Dragon Quest X.

name: Rammy No Daibouken Ⅱ
description: Sin descripción

Hard Terrain DLC includes:
* A whole new world with rains, muddy terrains, slimy fields for off-road fun

* Building repair and rebuilding functionality, using predefined materials (barn as a prototype to repair/rebuild)
* Ladders to climb up the barn

name: Tactical Nexus: Chapter 3 - Tactical Cloud-
